ModulePrefs.title: Image List View
ModulePrefs.description: Displays an icon on left side of a list item in a Google Site List View Template.
ModulePrefs.author: Raigosa.com Software Development Independent Contracting Services

UserPref.name: listViewURL
UserPref.display_name: Url of the List View Template.

UserPref.name: showerrors
UserPref.display_name: Display an error message when there are problems.

UserPref.name: debug
UserPref.display_name: Display debug information (any value will do to turn this on).
